Name: The Beloved
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
10 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
1 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A wonderfully complex marriage of cognac, distilled chocolate, rich Pedro Ximénez and banana liqueur with aromatic bitters and a dash of brine.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by James Wall at Hawksmoor, Air Street, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of The Beloved contains 195 calories
